titleInfo.title: D.F. et al v. Sacramento City Unified School District
titleInfo.subTitle: 5/23/2014. (Kastilahn, A)STATUS (PRETRIAL SCHEDULING) ORDER signed by Senior Judge William B. Shubb on 1/2/14 ORDERING that the Status (Pretrial Scheduling) Conference scheduled for 1/6/2014 is hereby VACATED. The VDRP process shall take place in February 2014, and the Neutral shall file a confirmation of completion of the VDRP process no later than 2/28/2014. The parties shall disclose any experts and produce any reports by no later than 4/7/2014. Any discovery, including depositions for preservation of testimony, is left open, save and except that it shall be so conducted as to be completed by 5/1/2014. All motions to compel discovery shall be heard not later than 5/1/2014. Motion for attorney's fees by plaintiff and any other motions shall be filed on or before 4/21/2014. The motion for attorneys' fees shall be set for hearing on June 2, 2014, at 2:00 p.m. Defendant's opposition to that motion shall be filed no later than 5/12/2014, and plaintiffs reply shall be filed no later than

titleInfo.title: D.F. et al v. Sacramento City Unified School District
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM and ORDER signed by Senior Judge William B. Shubb on 6/3/14 ORDERING that Plaintiff's MOTION for Attorneys' Fees and Costs 25 is DENIED; The Clerk is istructed to close this file. CASE CLOSED. (Mena-Sanchez, L)
